name: Rush Red & Blue
description:
Players will drive a sports car and race in the center of the city. The opponent is an AI robot. The rules of the game are very simple. The first person to finish two laps will win.
The location of the game is actually in the cyberspace. The arrow guardrail surrounds the track. The red arrow on the ground will greatly slow down the player's car speed, while the blue arrow will greatly increase the player's car speed. Players will gain acceleration ability enhancement, make full use of these to complete the competition with AI robot opponents! Or even faster to refresh the game time record.
